Module com.cab302.wellbeing.model
Package com.cab302.wellbeing.controller

Class MediaController

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.wellbeing.controller.MediaController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MediaController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is responsible for controlling the media player. It provides functionalities such as playing, pausing, and stopping media files, uploading and deleting media files, and applying color themes.
